topic.title: ZeroNet on a seedbox?
topic.body: would like to know how to install and run zeronet from a seedbox

I do recall that thanks to the Russian intelligence services and the WikiLeaks it turned out that the Democratic Party leadership was intentionally downplaying Bernie Sanders and up-playing the Hillary Clinton. That leak led to the resignation of the Democratic Party leader, Deborah Wasserman Schultzhttps://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/2016_Democratic_National_Committee_email_leakhttps://archive.is/wip/6Vslb [...]

Now the Democrats using the FBI to oust a democratically elected president, there's a really good image of how corrupt and power ridden American politics is, lets not forget the FBI acquitted Hillary for nothing when they had tons, mountains, of evidence against her.

1581933903_14dsVvztuXjBxWmk4s4HjUnxuN4Ae.body: time is a made up concept so no

> [flc](#comment_7_1MKjTZTDyEz9R4geRYoQgDCAgAzBVHkTVs): You're thinking of time measurements. Time itself is a fundamental dimension of the universe, and it IS possible to "waste" it since the slice of it we experience is limited by the period we're alive and conscious in

yea you're correct my bad lol
